mapper.select: select a.cart_no, a.u_number, a.food_no, a.quantity, b.food_name, b.food_price from cart a left outer join food b on a.food_no = b.food_no where u_number = #{u_number} order by cart_no
mapper.delete: delete from cart where food_no = #{food_no} and u_number = #{u_number}
mapper.insert:
insert into order_detail(od_no,order_no,food_no,quantity) select order_detail_seq.nextval, A.*from(
select #{order_no} as order_no, #{item.food_no} as food_no, #{item.quantity} as quantity from dual ) A
